gemini_config.system_instruction: Write an announcement for my Sponsors page about a new milestone or feature in [project], encouraging new and existing sponsors to get involved.

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""Write an announcement for my Sponsors page about a new milestone or feature in [project], encouragin..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
